column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata is a good example of a restaurant with an extensive menu with strong execution! Oftentimes
column2: restaurants with large menus can be hit or miss
column3: where some menu items are done well and others are mediocre or just plain awful. KR does a great job with everything from cocktails
column7: and dessert! Between my three friends and I
column8: we were able to sample dishes under almost every category except for their noodles.
